content: sts this is intentionally smaller than the stitch count you started with continue to work the instep as established and knit all sole sts until the foot is - 1 75 2 inches - 4 25 4 75 cm or i walk the line v1 0 - shuyi wu - 4 - 20 23 rounds short of the desired length ending after row 2 of the chart after a cc stripe toe cut cc the toe is worked in mc only you have 37 43 instep sts and 31 37 sole sts setup round 1 knit 1 st and move this st to the sole side move bor here knit 35 41 sts place a marker here for the end of the instep or adjust your needles to shift the remaining st to the sole side knit to the new bor now you have 35 41 instep sts and 33 39 sole sts setup round 2 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k1 k to bor 66 78 sts remain 33 39 instep sts and 33 39 sole sts work the two rounds below 7 8 times until 38 46 total sts remain round 1 k to bor round 2 decrease round k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before bor k2tog k1 work round 2 only 4 5 more times 22 26 sts remain cut yarn leaving a long tail 8 inches / 20 cm and graft the toe you can eliminate ears by treating the 2nd and 3rd stitches from each end as a single stitch when grafting so when you knit on or knit off you pass the needle through both stitches as if working a k2tog and when you purl on or purl off you pass the needle through both stitches as if working a p2tog this might be a little fiddly but it has the effect of continuing the decrease pattern while grafting finishing make a second sock weave in all ends block the finished socks i walk the line v1 0 - shuyi wu - 5 charts written instructions for chart row 1 cc k1 yo k11 byo 14 sts row 2 cc k1 ptbl p4 cdd k5 12 sts row 3 mc repeat row 1 14 sts row 4 mc k1 ktbl k4 cdd p5 12 sts i walk the line v1 0 - shuyi wu - 6
